title: Sea Of Gods Cheat Steam for SoT
text:
New free Sea Of Gods cheat by developer Daived for Sea of Thieves game is available now, which you can download from this page. This is a multifunctional hack in which you can find all the necessary functions for a comfortable game. The main functions Aimbot, ESP, Islands ESP, Global settings. Additionally you will be able to customize Player Fov, CrossHair, change time, Map Pins, Player List, Anti Afk and many other features.
The developer tried to make the hack available to everyone with the maximum number of features and convenience. Here you will find all the necessary cheat functions, convenient control through the hack menu right during the game, stable protection against banning in the game.

Support: Windows 10, Steam Client
Game Version: 2.9.2.1
Client:
Player FOV
Spyglass FOV
Oxygen Level
CrossHair
Custom Time Of Day
Aimbot:
Weapons Aimbot
Cannon Aimbot

Inject DLL with Process Hacker 2, Cheat Engine or use any working SoT injector
[FN+INS] or [INSERT] Open Menu.
[END] Unload Menu.
